title: (x) Porsche script - custom typeface {Yves}
content:
Does anyone know if this lettering exists as a font? Is it hand lettered only? If this has been discussed, forgive me. I tried the search and nothing came up.   
   
 ![/image](http://web.archive.org/web/20090426181942im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41587.jpg)
author: matt_desmond

comments.content:
That's one of the classics in custom lettering and custom type:   
the names of car types on the backs of cars. It's possible that   
someone made a freeware typeface out of it (Iconian for example   
has the Porshe and Dodge brand typefaces in its collection).
Yeah, I checked around and the free font sites have the wide porsche sans-serif font but not this script lettering.
